info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 7:52PM EDT until August 10 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of Big Bend Florida, including the following county, Leon.
* WHEN...Until 945 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 751 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tallahassee, Florida A and M, Lake Munson, Gaither Community Center, Eight Mile Pond, Springsax Park, Lake Bradford, Callen Neighborhood, Tallahassee Regional A/P, North Florida Fairgrounds, Gene Cox Stadium, Walker Ford Community Center, Providence Neighborhood, Jack McLean Park, Innovation Park, Apalachee Ridge Estates, Bragg Stadium, South City, Leon Sinks and Indian Head Acres. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT THIS EVENING
